title: Get the balance and budget of ad accounts

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of additional fields to return in the response. Supported values: budget_remaining : The remaining budget. budget_frequency_restriction : Restrictions on the number of budget changes allowed for the current day. budget_amount_restriction : Restrictions on the minimum amount that can be changed for the budget. min_transferable_amount : Details of the minimal amount that you can transfer to the ad account. max_transferable_amount : Details of the maximum amounts that you can transfer from the ad account to the Business Center. balance_info : Details of the balances for the ad account. If this field is not specified, all information will be returned by default excluding budget_remaining , budget_frequency_restriction , min_transferable_amount , max_transferable_amount , and balance_info . If you want to retrieve the additional fields ( budget_remaining , budget_frequency_restriction , budget_amount_restriction , min_transferable_amount , max_transferable_amount , and balance_info ) together with other fields, set fields to ["budget_remaining", "budget_frequency_restriction", "budget_amount_restriction", "min_transferable_amount", "max_transferable_amount", "balance_info"] and page_size to 1.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keywords, you can search for ad account name or ad account ID.

parameters.name: advertiser_status
parameters.description: Ad Account display status. Enum values： SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_NOT_APPROVED : failed. SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_APPROVED : passed. SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_IN_REVIEW : under review. SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_PUNISHED : punishment.

parameters.name: payment_portfolio_id
parameters.description: Valid when you have enabled the multiple Payment Portfolios feature. The ID of the Payment Portfolio to filter the results by. Note : Multiple Payment Portfolios for one client is currently an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative. If this field is specified, the balance information in the response will be for the ad account linked to the Payment Portfolio ( payment_portfolio_id ).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current number of pages. Default value: 1 . Value range : ≥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 10 . Value range: 1-50.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: advertiser_account_list
fields.description: Advertiser account balance list. Note : If the ad account belongs to a Business Center that has enabled Payment Portfolio, the following parameters will be for the Payment Portfolio rather than the ad account: account_balance valid_account_balance frozen_balance tax cash_balance valid_cash_balance transferable_amount

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: Advertiser account ID.

fields.name: advertiser_name
fields.description: Advertiser account name.

fields.name: advertiser_status
fields.description: Advertiser account display status. Enum values： SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_NOT_APPROVED : failed. SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_APPROVED : passed. SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_IN_REVIEW : under review. SHOW_ACCOUNT_STATUS_PUNISHED : punishment.

fields.name: advertiser_type
fields.description: Advertiser account type. Enum values： AUCTION (auction), RESERVATION (reservation).

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: Advertiser account time zone. For enum values, see Appendix-Time Zone .

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Advertiser account currency. For enum values, see Appendix-Currency .

fields.name: account_open_days
fields.description: Advertiser account opening days.

fields.name: balance_reminder
fields.description: Balance hit the line, when the balance hit the line is yes, it means that you should add money to the main account of the advertisement.

fields.name: company
fields.description: Advertiser account company name.

fields.name: contact_name
fields.description: Advertiser account contact name.

fields.name: contact_email
fields.description: Advertiser account contact email.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: Advertiser account opening time (UTC+0). Example: 2017-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: first_recharge_amount Deprecated
fields.description: First recharge amount, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: first_recharge_time Deprecated
fields.description: First recharge time (UTC+0). Example: 2017-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: latest_recharge_time Deprecated
fields.description: Last recharge time (UTC+0). Example: 2017-01-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: recharge_amount Deprecated
fields.description: Recharge the total amount, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: recharge_count Deprecated
fields.description: Total number of recharges.

fields.name: account_balance
fields.description: Advertiser account total balance, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: valid_account_balance
fields.description: Advertiser account valid account balance, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: frozen_balance
fields.description: Advertiser account frozen balance, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: tax
fields.description: Advertiser account taxes, kept to two decimal places. The default value is 0 .

fields.name: cash_balance
fields.description: Advertiser account cash balance, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: valid_cash_balance
fields.description: Advertiser account valid cash balance, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: grant_balance
fields.description: Advertiser account coupon/voucher balance, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: valid_grant_balance
fields.description: Advertiser account valid coupon/voucher balance, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: payment_portfolio_id
fields.description: Returned only for a Business Center that has enabled Payment Portfolio. The ID of the Payment Portfolio linked to the ad account.

fields.name: payment_portfolio_name
fields.description: Returned only for a Business Center that has enabled Payment Portfolio. The name of the Payment Portfolio linked to the ad account.

fields.name: transferable_amount
fields.description: Amount that you can transfer from the advertiser account, based on the currency used in your advertiser account, and kept to two decimal places. Note : The transferable amount excludes the frozen balance ( frozen_balance ) and the deposit for ad delivery. Therefore, the transferable_amount might be lower than both valid_cash_balance and valid_account_balance . To ensure uninterrupted ad delivery, we recommend transferring an amount not greater than the transferable_amount . This field will only be returned when total_number is 1.

fields.name: max_transferable_amount
fields.description: Details of the maximum amount that you can transfer from the ad account to the Business Center.

fields.name: cash_amount
fields.description: The maximum cash amount that you can transfer from the ad account to the Business Center, based on the currency used in your advertiser account, and kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: grant_amount
fields.description: The maximum voucher amount that you can transfer from the ad account to the Business Center, based on the currency used in your advertiser account, and kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: balance_info
fields.description: Details of the balances for the ad account.

fields.name: account_balance
fields.description: The total balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places. Formula: account_balance = valid_account_balance + frozen_balance + tax .

fields.name: frozen_balance
fields.description: The frozen balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: valid_account_balance
fields.description: The available balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: tax
fields.description: The taxes of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: cash_balance
fields.description: The total cash balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: frozen_cash_balance
fields.description: The frozen cash balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: cash_tax
fields.description: The cash taxes of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: valid_cash_balance
fields.description: The available cash balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places. Formula: valid_cash_balance = cash_balance - ( frozen_cash_balance + cash_tax ).

fields.name: grant_balance
fields.description: The total voucher balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: valid_grant_balance
fields.description: The available voucher balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: frozen_grant_balance
fields.description: The frozen voucher balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: credit_balance
fields.description: The total credit balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: valid_credit_balance
fields.description: The available credit balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: frozen_credit_balance
fields.description: The frozen credit balance of the ad account, kept to two decimal places.

fields.name: budget_mode
fields.description: Budget mode of the ad account. Enum values: UNLIMITED : No budget limit for the ad account. MONTHLY_BUDGET : The ad account consumes BC credit balance within the monthly budget. DAILY_BUDGET : The ad account consumes BC credit balance within the daily budget. CUSTOM_BUDGET : The ad account consumes BC credit balance within the one-time custom budget. Note : If the BC is in manual allocation mode, the returned value is always UNLIMITED . The default budget mode for each ad account is UNLIMITED unless you customize your budget mode.

fields.name: budget
fields.description: If budget_mode = MONTHLY_BUDGET , the monthly budget of the advertiser account will be returned. If budget_mode = DAILY_BUDGET , the daily budget of the advertiser account will be returned. If budget_mode = CUSTOM_BUDGET , the one-time custom budget of the advertiser account will be returned. If budget_mode = UNLIMITED , returns 0 .

fields.name: budget_cost
fields.description: If budget_mode is MONTHLY_BUDGET , DAILY_BUDGET , or CUSTOM_BUDGET , spent budget of the ad account will be returned. If budget_mode = UNLIMITED , returns 0 .

fields.name: budget_remaining
fields.description: The remaining budget. Formula: budget_remaining = budget - budget_cost .

fields.name: budget_frequency_restriction
fields.description: Restrictions on the number of budget changes allowed for the current day. You can make up to 10 updates per day, including both budget mode and budget amount changes or only budget amount changes for the ad account.

fields.name: total_count
fields.description: The maximum number of updates allowed. Example: 10.

fields.name: used_count
fields.description: The number of updates that have been made. Example: 0.

fields.name: remaining_count
fields.description: The remaining number of updates allowed. Example: 10.

fields.name: effective_start_time
fields.description: The time when the restriction starts, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0 time). Example: 2025-01-01 00:00:01 .

fields.name: effective_end_time
fields.description: The time when the restriction ends, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0 time). Example: 2025-01-01 23:59:59 .

fields.name: budget_amount_restriction
fields.description: Restrictions on the minimum amount that can be changed for the budget.

fields.name: minimum_amount
fields.description: The minimum amount that you can change for the budget. The amount is based on the budget that has been consumed during the budget period. The change amount should be equal to or greater than this value.

fields.name: min_transferable_amount
fields.description: Returned only when page_size is set to 1 in the request. Details of the minimal amount that you can transfer to the ad account.

fields.name: cash_amount
fields.description: The minimum cash amount that you can transfer to the ad account.

fields.name: grant_amount
fields.description: The minimum voucher amount that you can transfer to the ad account.

fields.name: credit_amount
fields.description: The minimum credit amount that you can transfer to the ad account.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total number of pages.
